content.rendered:
Chelsea and Scott tied the knot with a chic, romantic summer wedding ceremony and reception at The Bridge Building.

This sweet pair met through mutual friends a few years ago and undoubtedly hit it off. Scott later proposed to Chelsea on the rooftop deck of their new home—their favorite place to be—during an intimate gathering with two of their best friends. 

When it came time to choose their dream venue, Chelsea and Scott felt at home on the rooftop of The Bridge Building, and they loved having the view of the city. Chelsea later explained “Scott was sold as soon as we toured it," and we can’t blame him!

Before their traditional ceremony, the pair shared their most memorable moment: the first look! It was intimate and emotional for both of them It also helped calm their wedding day nerves. 

Once the two said their “I dos,” guests made their way to the Cumberland space for the reception. Tables were set with summer florals, gold tea light candles, and acrylic table numbers. 

Soon after guests found their seats, they were served plated meals of delectable selections like maple mustard glazed chicken with yellow squash and whipped potatoes, smoked brisket with grilled corn and four-cheese macaroni, and bourbon-glazed salmon with grilled asparagus and parmesan risotto. 

After dinner, Chelsea and Scott kicked off the party with their first dance as the DJ played the song  “Blessed” by one of their favorite artists, Thomas Rhett. 

And instead of a traditional send-off at the end of the night, the newlyweds invited their friends over to their house to continue the celebration.

Keep scrolling for more on this chic summer wedding day. 

WEDDING DETAILS

Date: July 11, 2020
Happy Couple: Chelsea + Scott
Location: The Bridge Building
Colors: Champagne, White, & Gold 
Photographer: Hannah Leigh Imagery
Florist: Echoes of Eden Florals
Hair: Primp This
Cake: Publix
Rentals: Music City Tents  + BBJ Linen
DJ: Danny Sirikoun
Catering & Bar: The Bridge Building
Lighting: Nashville Lighting & Production
Planning: Kalyn & Cori | IH

excerpt.rendered: A chic wedding ceremony and reception with contemporary style at The Bridge Building.
